channel.title: Projects on fharook
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on fharook

item.title: Dissecting Harmful Memes – Semantic Role Labeling
item.description: Jan–May 2022: Classified entities in memes as hero/villain/victim/other. NER + Wu-Palmer similarity. 8th place @ CONSTRAINT 2022 (F1: 23.855).

item.title: Multi-modal Content Annotation for Comic Mischief Detection
item.description: Aug–Dec 2021: Video + audio classification for content moderation. Tested 7 models (binary & multi-label).

item.title: WHO COVID-19 Global Region-wise Reports Automation
item.description: Jun 2021: Python browser automation script using ClointFusion for WHO COVID reports (Hackathon).

item.title: Multi-modal Fake News Detection
item.description: Jan–May 2021: Used Fakeddit dataset. TI-CNN with ResNet-50 (images) + LSTM (text) for fake news detection.
